sentences.sContent: The new resort area has boosted tourism.
sentences.sCn: 新的度假区促进了旅游业的发展。

remMethod.val: 自吹(boast)自擂， 宣扬(boost)自我

trans.tranCn: 使增长，使兴旺；鼓励，促进；为…作宣传，宣扬
trans.tranOther: to increase or improve something and make it more successful

trans.tranCn: 增加， 提高； 帮助， 激励
trans.tranOther: something that gives someone more confidence, or that helps something increase, improve, or become successful
